verbose_text: Here, we provide detailed evidence to support the hypothesis that BBB endothelial CD146 is an important adhesion receptor that is actively involved in the transmigration of lymphocytes across the BBB and promotes the formation of CNS lesions in MS and EAE.
evidence: support the hypothesis that BBB endothelial CD146 is an important adhesion receptor that is actively involved in the transmigration of lymphocytes across the BBB and promotes the formation of CNS lesions in MS
